title: Grayson 3-piece Sloped Arm Upholstered Living Room Set Grey
description: Upholstered in a grey top grain leather, this sofa seating set can truly lend itself to the color palette of your choosing. Thin sloped track arms with stitch detailing, along with deep pillow-like seating invite you to sit back and relax. In addition, each cushion and seat is filled with premium eco-friendly down alternative, making them the perfect addition to a green home and lifestyle. Matching side kidney pillows offer extra comfort. Constructed of solid wood frames, each piece is made to last for many years and offers a stable, durable build.

title: Flamenco 2-piece Tufted Upholstered Power Living Room Set Charcoal
description: A performance leatherette with a diamond stitched pattern wraps around each piece of this power sofa set, lending a handsome vibe. Beneath the breathable faux leather material is a soothing, cool gel memory foam topper. In addition, a space-saving and convenient wall hugging mechanism allows you to kick back and relax to watch a movie or read a book. Plus, each piece comes with the extra convenience of a drop down table or a center console, each with two stainless steel cup holders to keep a cold refreshment nearby. Last but not least, plush arm rests and headrests offer ultimate comfort.

title: Garnet 6-piece Modular Power^2 Sectional Light Grey
description: Transitional with a touch of glam, this modular sectional features power motion capabilities to suit each seated person.Wrapped in a light grey top grain leather, this sectional offers plush, tufted backrests with a diamond stamped center pattern.Included is also a console with a lift top storage compartment and two stainless steel cup holders.Adding an extra, refined touch is individual nailhead trim along the rolled arms.This modular sectional also has cool gel memory foam toppers.

title: Gano 2-piece Sloped Arm Living Room Set Navy Blue
description: Designed with a navy blue woven fabric and a mid-century style, this 2-piece sofa seating set lends a charm to any room. Elegantly styled, each piece silhouette offers a gently sloped and slightly flared, tapered arms. This retro-inspired furniture set lends a vintage look, complete with channel tufted back cushions. Tapered woods made of sturdy, solid hardwood offer extra stability and support, as well as extra flare to the retro look. Each leg is finished in a dark brown tone that completes the modern vibe.

title: Glenmark 2-piece Track Arm Living Room Set Taupe
description: Each wrapped entirely in a soft taupe leatherette upholstery, this seating set makes a striking addition to a contemporary style living room. Designed with a modern flair and a clean line silhouette, each furniture piece offers gentle curves along the seats and backrests. Plus, accents and small details such as top stitching and silver metal bracket legs add a sophisticated and glamorous touch. Invite family and guests to unwind against a tall attached backrest and seat cushions as they watch a movie or drink cocktails. Constructed of a sturdy solid wood frame, each piece is designed to be long-lasting.

title: Glenn 2-piece Cushion Back Living Room Set Light Grey
description: Made for a modern farmhouse living room, this elegant sofa and loveseat feature tailored English saddle style arms and T-shaped cushions.Wrapped in a light grey linen-like fabric, this set lends a charming, country quality to a space.Resting on dark brown turned legs, each piece offers a homely elegance.Included with each are accent pillows in a plaid and houndstooth patterns.Place this set in a room to create a traditional-inspired design aesthetic.

title: Gulfdale 2-piece Cushion Back Upholstered Living Room Set Dark Teal
description: With self-welted, slim track arms as well as tailored and lightly tufted seats, this retro-inspired seating ensemble offers comfortable place to relax and unwind. Wrapped entirely in a bold dark teal velvet upholstery that adds a glamorous flair, each furniture piece offers a striking addition to a modern style home or living room. Plus, a high backrest offers long-lasting support. With a mid-century flair, each furniture piece is elevated by tall tapered legs in a contrasting black finish. With a solid wood construction, this seating set is intended to last many years in your home.

title: Hartsook 2-piece Pillow Top Arm Living Room Set Charcoal Grey
description: Soft to the touch and ultra-cozy, this seating set is wrapped in a charcoal grey velvet upholstery, which complements existing color palettes. The perfect combination of both comfort and luxury, this sofa set is designed with plush high back rests and pillow top armrests that invite you to unwind after a long day. Designed with a contemporary or transitional style home in mind, each furniture piece has attached seat cushions with supportive pocket coils that creates a long-lasting piece. Lastly, each piece is subtly elevated by wide block style legs in a deep black finish. Bring this restful furniture ensemble into your home to allow seating for up to four people.

title: Grisby 2-piece Channeled Tufted Back Sectional Silver
description: Any guest will take a second look at this luxurious silver sectional with a chaise lounge. The unexpected velvet upholstery brings an extra special touch to this piece. Vertical tufting provides an exceptional visual display along with comfort. Bold gold trim at the platform base makes for yet another unexpected surprise. This piece is beautifully crafted for glam style living spaces.

title: Higgins Four-Piece Upholstered Power Sectional Grey
description: Add a chic, sophisticated focal point to your living room or den. This elegant, four-piece sectional pulls a room together in stylish harmony. Complete with elegant stitched accents, this sectional is a fashionable and practical choice.

title: Glenn 3-piece Cushion Back Living Room Set Light Grey
description: Chic and sophisticated, this impeccable three-piece living room sofa set is just the choice for a stylish, coordinated look.Offering a three-seat sofa, two-seat loveseat and an armchair, the set is anchored with clean, classic lines including tailored English arms and attached back cushions.Gentle curves draw the eye while T-cushion seating ensures plush comfort and support.Each piece in the set rests on turned feet in an espresso finish.The sofa and loveseat feature light grey linen-like upholstery while the chair adds dimension and character with a charming grey houndstooth pattern.
